dmca.title: [AB-C7476T] Misuse of Jacuzzi(r) Trademark
dmca.body:
T -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Thursday, July 06, 2006 11:23 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [AB-C7476T] Misuse of Jacuzzi(r) Trademark Subject: [AB-C7476T] Misuse of Jacuzzi(r) Trademark Reference: [AB-C7476T] For your review. Note that this is an old report from 15 June. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. Misuse of Jacuzzi(r) Trademark Added by system at Thursday, Jun 15 2006 10:37 am X-MailFrom: trademarks@jacuzzibrands.com X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.181] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ; Thu Jun 15 10:37:50 2006 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 15 Jun 2006 10:37:50 -0500 Received: from mail.inside.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.110] helo=mail.theplanet.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from trademarks@jacuzzibrands.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1Fqtuo-000FFa-Ow for abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com; Thu, 15 Jun 2006 10:37:50 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from trademarks@jacuzzibrands.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1Fqtun-00042l-KJ for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 15 Jun 2006 10:37:49 -0500 Received: from mail1.cyveillance.com ([63.100.163.123]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from trademarks@jacuzzibrands.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Fqtun-000FFS-7W for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 15 Jun 2006 10:37:49 -0500 Received: from prodap2.corp.cyveillance.com (unknown [10.9.1.122]) by mail1.cyveillance.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 85BAB7800C for ; Thu, 15 Jun 2006 11:40:05 -0400 (EDT) Message-ID: <24411284.211150385868500.JavaMail.cicusr@prodap2.corp.cyveillance.com> Date: Thu, 15 Jun 2006 11:37:48 -0400 (EDT) From: trademarks@jacuzzibrands.com To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: Misuse of Jacuzzi(r) Trademark MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 63.100.163.123 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of jacuzzibrands.com) client-ip=63.100.163.123; envelope-from=trademarks@jacuzzibrands.com; helo=mail1.cyveillance.com; MIME element (text/html)

  

 

 

06/15/2006

 

Via Electronic Mail

 ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

title

1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110 Dallas TX, 75207

 

 

 

 

          Re:     http://basinpark.com/packages.htm

 

Dear ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. :

 

I am Corporate Counsel for Jacuzzi Inc. ("Jacuzzi") and for Jacuzzi Brands, Inc., its parent company.  Jacuzzi has manufactured and distributed whirlpool baths, whirlpool spas, and hot tubs bearing the JACUZZI® mark throughout the world for over 45 years.  Our company also manufactures a host of other products offered under the JACUZZI ® brand, including shower units, bathroom fixtures, and furniture.  Jacuzzi is the owner of numerous federal trademark registrations for its JACUZZI® mark, including among others, U.S. Trademark Registration Nos. 0807314, 1,241,022 and 1,717,864.  As a result of the marketing and promotion of the JACUZZI® brand and the substantial and continuous use the mark in commerce by our company for over 45 years, the JACUZZI® mark is famous and exclusively associated by consumers and the trade with our company. 

 

In connection with our brand protection efforts, we regularly review third-party usage of our trademarks.  Recently it came to our attention that your website located at http://basinpark.com/packages.htm improperly uses the JACUZZI® trademark.

 

If, and only if, the product was manufactured by Jacuzzi Inc., you may use the JACUZZI® trademark to indicate that the whirlpool bath, whirlpool spa or other product was manufactured by our company (example: "our website features a full selection of Jacuzzi® whirlpool baths and bathroom fixtures").  Our JACUZZI® trademark should always be capitalized and recognition of our federal trademark registration should be evidenced by the use of the ® symbol as in "JACUZZI® whirlpool baths."  Please remember, only if the whirlpool bath, spa, or hot tub that you are referring to was manufactured or distributed by Jacuzzi, or one of its divisions or affiliates, may it be referred to as a JACUZZI® brand whirlpool bath or spa. 

 

Even if the product in question was manufactured by Jacuzzi, or one of its divisions or affiliates, your use of the JACUZZI® trademark should be for informational purposes only and should never appear in a manner which infers or suggests a co-promotion, connection or affiliation with the Jacuzzi companies or which creates the impression that your website was approved or sponsored by our company in any way.

 

The JACUZZI® trademark should never be used to describe whirlpool baths or whirlpool spas in general.  By way of example, the phrase "click here to view more jacuzzis" is improper or our hotel features
